channel.title: motophie TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from motophie

item.title: WE ASKED AND THEY LISTENED?!?!? 🙂‍↕️🙂‍↕️ High rise jeans that have AAA graded stretch denim WITH d30 ghost armour?!??! 🥹 I’m very excited to finally try @SA1NT CC ‘s latest coretec high rise skinny jeans that launched today!!👖 (come in men’s too!) Here is

item.title: After security spoke to us, a random couple in a car drove up to us and asked whether we got kicked out. I told them what happened and they said “if not here, then where? On the road?! I’ll go talk to the security” 🤣 I said it was fine, that we understood
item.description: After security spoke to us, a random couple in a car drove up to us and asked whether we got kicked out. I told them what happened and they said “if not here, then where? On the road?! I’ll go talk to the security” 🤣 I said it was fine, that we understood
item.author: motophie

item.title: my cadence when yapping and riding is so odd 🤣 i dont know how vloggers can be so well spoken while riding HAHA Im using my cardo packtalk edge to record my voice here 🎙️ You can use code MOTOPHIE for $ off your cardo 💗 . . . . #Motorcycle #motorcyclegear
item.description: my cadence when yapping and riding is so odd 🤣 i dont know how vloggers can be so well spoken while riding HAHA Im using my cardo packtalk edge to record my voice here 🎙️ You can use code MOTOPHIE for $ off your cardo 💗 . . . . #Motorcycle #motorcyclegear

item.title: tbh I almost believed them 🤣 also I just got measured properly and I’m actually 152cm (4ft 11.8 can I round up to 5ft???) . . . #learningtoride #Motorcycle #motorcyclebeginner #shortriders #motorcycles #motorcyclejourneys #motorcyclesoftiktok

item.title: documenting my noob arc for everyone to laugh at 😅 there are actually so many more things I’ve learned / still learning over the last year but these were the first 3 that came to mind: 1️⃣ lane positioning 2️⃣ shifting with intention 3️⃣ don’t grab the f

item.title: when they said riding is the best form of therapy, they weren’t joking 🍃 ive been such a people pleaser my whole life, it was always hard to know what I truly wanted deep down. but riding has given me a sense of freedom and independence I’ve never felt be

item.author: motophie

item.title: 10/10 panic 🤣 gorgeous view at melbourne airport lookout but im not sure it's very bike friendly i saw on goog reviews that they installed some more lights and 'repaved' the road now I realise they just filled the pot holes + rest of the road with gravel
